short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple calculator extension for performing basic arithmetic calculations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EasyCalc, calculator extension designed to simplify your calculations!

Key Features:

Dark Mode and Light Mode: Choose between dark mode and light mode to suit your visual preferences and reduce eye strain. EasyCalc adapts to your browsing environment, ensuring a comfortable and personalized experience.

Sleek and Efficient Design: EasyCalc's sleek and efficient design not only looks great but also maximizes functionality. Enjoy a clutter-free calculator interface that allows you to focus on your calculations without distractions.

Persistent Value Storage: Don't worry about losing your progress. EasyCalc automatically saves every value until cleared, so you can easily reference previous results or continue building on existing calculations.

Note: EasyCalc prioritizes your privacy and does not collect any personal data. Your security and peace of mind are of utmost importance to us.
